- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Joyce,Yes, you can check out my privage landing page here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. Looking forward to connecting!Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. From: joyce@joycecacho.com [mailto:joyce@joycecacho.com] Sent: Monday, November 12, 2012 5:59 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: joyce@joycecacho.com Subject: RE: phone trouble Ok Sara. Talk with you tomorrow at 330pm. Are there any materials I can review the before our call?
Joyce
-----Original message-----From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: "joyce@joycecacho.com <mailto:joyce@joycecacho.com>" <joyce@joycecacho.com <mailto:joyce@joycecacho.com>> Sent: Mon, Nov 12, 2012 17:21:12 EST Subject: RE: phone troubleYes, that would work for me. I will call you at 3:30pm EST tomorrow. Thanks for being so flexible and understanding. Talk to you then,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: joyce@joycecacho.com <mailto:joyce@joycecacho.com> [mailto:joyce@joycecacho.com <mailto:joyce@joycecacho.com>] Sent: Monday, November 12, 2012 5:01 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: joyce@joycecacho.com <mailto:joyce@joycecacho.com> Subject: Re: phone trouble Hi Sara, Thanks for the update. Unfortunately, I'm in meetings until 3pm tomorrow and have another meeting scheduled to begin at 4pm. Would a call at 330pm tomorrow be possible? Joyce
-----Original message-----From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: "joyce@joycecacho.com <mailto:joyce@joycecacho.com>" <joyce@joycecacho.com <mailto:joyce@joycecacho.com>> Sent: Mon, Nov 12, 2012 16:07:32 EST Subject: phone troubleHi Joyce, I am working from home today and I am so sorry but my remote phone is giving me trouble. Can I give you a ring tomorrow at 10:30am? I am so to have to change this on you at the last min. If 10:30am doesnt work for you tomorrow just let me know what time will and I will do my best to accommodate my schedule accordingly. I am so looking forwarding to connecting, have a great night.Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
